thread.title: Vault by Vans and Schoeller Design a Weather-Ready Footwear Capsule
thread.title_full: Vault by Vans and Schoeller Design a Weather-Ready Footwear Capsule

author: Contributor
title: Vault by Vans and Schoeller Design a Weather-Ready Footwear Capsule
text:
Visit the original post to see all 16 images from this gallery. 
Brand : Vault by Vans x Schoeller
Models : Mid Skool Lite LX, Authentic ’66 Lite LX, Authentic Lite and Mid Skool Lite
Key Features : The respective models are essentially revamped with water repellent soft shell fabric uppers and are modified versions of their original vulcanized forms.
Release Date : March 25 
Price : The Vault by Vans x Schoeller collection retails from $80 to $105
Availability : Worldwide availability at select Vans Vault accounts .
Editor’s Notes : Ensuring maximum functionality and all-day comfort, each pair incorporates Vans Classic Lites construction that features UltraCush™ Lite technology and an ActionFit™ last shape to re-engineer the iconic footwear styles with improved fit and an overall weight reduction. Offered in shades of green, blue, off-white, and black, these are easily the most luxurious Vans to release this spring.
Now peep these smoked meat sandwich inspired creps from Vans and Off the Hook.
